question: Which of the following organizations was founded by Dadabhai Naoroji in 1866?
explanation: In the year 1865, under the leadership of Dadabhai Naoroji and W.C. Bonnerjee, the London India Society was established in London. In the year 1866, Dadabhai Naoroji founded the East India Association. The main objective of the organization was to rasie voice in favour of India related matters amongst the British public.
